H0.text: Iron is the natural material Erin should use to make a strong, light chair.

H1.text: Granite is the natural material Erin should use to make a strong, light chair.

H2.text: Clay is the natural material Erin should use to make a strong, light chair.

H3.text: Wood is the natural material Erin should use to make a strong, light chair.

A4.text: Wood has always been used extensively for furniture, such as chairs and beds.

A5.text: In many uses of wood, total strength is not the main consideration.

A8.text: The average density of granite is between 2.65 and 2.75 g/cmÂ³ (165 and 172 lb/cu ft)

A9.text: its compressive strength usually lies above 200 MPa (29,000 psi)
